Sample of Alex Merced's Coding Projects

devNursery.com

Community for developers to network and learn to code. Created with React/Typescript.

Savvy Hotspots

Site for searching and commenting on Savannah, GA Hotspots! Created with React/PHP/Postgres

BetterBoxD

Social Network for liking and commenting on your favorite movies, created with AngularJS, Express and MongoDB

EveVol - Event/Volunteers

Application for tracking events and volunteers created with Express/EJS/Mongo

Calculator

Fully Functioning Calculator created with html/css/js

Pet Adoption App

App for finding local adoptable pets created with html/css/js/jQuery

Todo List

Todo List with Save and Load feature created with html/css/js/localStorage

Bill & Ted | Tic-Tac-Toe

Bill and Ted Themed Tic-Tac-Toe Game created with html/css/js.
